price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ ߟߋ߫ ߕߍ߬ߘߍ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߌ߬ߓߟߏߝߍ߬
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
